name: Garden Escapade
description:
Game that the controls works similar to Caterpillar

bunnies deplete score

flowers increase score

20 flowers and you win game

score of 0 ends game

Mac executable runs buggy, working on a fix. May or may not start on your Mac. please give it time to load, in most cases it just takes a while.

images are not my own, credit given to those who own the assets
